summary:
Getting started, advanced training, consulting in materials, creating clinics with great fun for groups from zeroes to heroes, ice skating or inline - skating, that's what I deliver. No matter what skills or materials are brought in, we both enjoy, while YOU, my client(s) improves along the way. The way UP! 

Furthermore , I'm ALLWAYS in for freelance business,  that involves management or training, teaching, or just added working force, in  project management, and coaching,  using my drive, creative nature and background. Creating mutual success. Having an equal intrest in the technical, financial and human assets.  Sales, services, applied technical science, my scope is wide. My energy bright.

location.default: Bergen op Zoom, North Brabant, Netherlands

education.field_of_study: Business administration / Bedrijfskunde / Business management / Bedrijfsmanagement

certifications.name: Skate trainer ST-3 (Dutch Speedskating Association KNSB approved)

profile_positions.description: Clinics and sports training in speed skating and inline-skating. For groups, clubs, projects (schools, city events, mobile ice accommodations). For long-time relationships or short-term projects and clinics. Clinics just for fun and education to schools or special groups with different approaches (partially disabled). Training for fun, to learn, to train, to compete. For the development of talented sportsmen and women, but also for the young, older and and for all who search for fun and pleasure so for leisure and quality time. On the streets, in ice domes or any particular but suited area.
profile_positions.title: Schaatsinstructeur

profile_positions.description: Making new business proposals. Liasion between companies. New business development.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Project Manager

profile_positions.description: After several jobs in sales and project management at large and smaller businesses in the installation field (HVAC, electrical, ICT), Cor started Soittel to meet the developing, opened-up market of telecommunications and networking  by helping end-users to search and find their way in the booming business of public network providers. Consultancy, cost calculations, balanced advisory for best benefits to meet company's requirements for cabled or wireless network services were key words in the beginning of Soittel. Business contacts used more and more the personal skills of Cor in management consulting and training, Researching, reporting, presenting and empowering new business development in a wide range of industries is more and more Cor's working area. Communication, selling processes, negotiation, scanning markets, source development brings colours and flavors to our working days.
profile_positions.title: Owner

company.name: Arkel Telecommunicatie BV Venlo (since year 2000 part of CSS Holding NV, Den Bosch)

profile_positions.company: Arkel Telecommunicatie BV Venlo (since year 2000 part of CSS Holding NV, Den Bosch)
profile_positions.description: Started as Business Unit Manager Sales: telecom systems. Generating sales by leading a sales team of approximately 6 account managers and in-company callcentre. Representing leading brands in PABx systems as Siemens Hicom, Philips and Matra eXitel. Switched to Manager Operations to support and lead the fast developing group of soft- and hardware engineers to keep up with fast revealing new business opportunities in this recently expanding and evolving business. Privatisation of telecom from goverment to private industry since 1992. Booming integration of voice and IP.
profile_positions.title: Manager Operations / Business Unit Manager Sales

company.name: Cofely NV Nederland (part of  GDF SUEZ). (formerly nv GTI Holding, subsidiary GTI Heerlen BV)

profile_positions.company: Cofely NV Nederland (part of  GDF SUEZ). (formerly nv GTI Holding, subsidiary GTI Heerlen BV)
profile_positions.description:
Starting as overall account manager technical installations. 
Developing into project manager for a specialized group of technicians and engineers in datanetworking (cable networks, fiber optics). Generating new business opportunities for this specialisation. Profiling this relative new business to inhouse clients (other GTI subsidiaries in the southern part of The Netherlands and their customers), as well as prospecting new business.  Implementing active components in our datanetworks with experienced partners. 
Participating in strategy meetings on top management level for strategic long-term business plans, such as "GTI 2000". 
Participating for account management and market knowledge in a new business start-up.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

company.name: Brunel (Branch MULTEC,  Uitzendburo voor Hoger Technisch Personeel)

profile_positions.company: Brunel (Branch MULTEC,  Uitzendburo voor Hoger Technisch Personeel)
profile_positions.description: Account manager / HR Recruiter for temporarily and on-going jobs for technicians at level Bachelor or Master of Science.  My Focus on Electrical and Information Technology . Expanding business, therefore a fast career move to Office Manager of Maasticht, in those days one of 15 branches of MULTEC in The Netherlands and growing fast.
profile_positions.title: Office Manager

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of the Board, chairman of the Technical Department (sports trainers)
volunteer_experiences.description: Chairman of the Technical Team that employs about 25 skate trainers at De Striene West-Brabant. Representing this team as a member of the board of this sportsclub. Managing the different groups and their specific  skills to support newcomers, recreational and competitive skaters of all ages. Also using communicative skills to initiate and support marketing activities  for the recruitment of new members.

Ice skating activities on a yearly, temporarily  ice skating rink in the city centre of Bergen op Zoom. 
Project management of skating facilities for groups (school students), co-operating with the City Sports Organization called Fitfabriek and trainee / students from the sports academy Cios Goes (Scaldis).  Also giving skate clinics on the ice, Using ice hockey and longtrack speedskating skills.

volunteer_experiences.role: Host / Skate trainer for skate clinics
volunteer_experiences.description: Temporary ice skating rink in Roosendaal every year. More the less the same activities as at StaBoZ Bergen op Zoom.
